title: This was one of the original splash screens for Talisma
content: This was one of the original splash screens for the application Talisma. ![splash screen](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417063857im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/932.jpg)
author: funcmedia

comments.content: Hmmm...I like the symbol, not sure about the background though, and the type looks sort of...I dunno, not as good as the symbol ![:)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417063857im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
